alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake; Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 8:30PM MDT until August 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Northern Utah County in northern Utah... * Until 900 PM MDT * At 828 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Draper, or near Sandy, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sandy, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, Alpine, Bluffdale, Little Cottonwood Creek Valley, Granite, Cottonwood West, Big Cottonwood Canyon and Little Cottonwood Canyon. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 286 and 300. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
